name: Henrik Schück
obverse: Bust of Henrik Schück facing left.
reverse: Inscription in 7 lines enclosed in a square. Around the square are four wreaths. Inscription around the edge of the medal.
reverse_inscriptions: LITTERARUM ATQUE HUMANITATIS PRINCIPI ACADEMIARUM NOSTRATIUM DECORI
description: Henrik Schück was a Swedish literary historian, university professor and author.
